Name: Romans From Mars 360
About the game: Experience the all-time favorite Romans from Mars in Virtual Reality (VR) with Google Cardboard! You are a Roman soldier, and you and your crossbow are all that stands in the way of the invading Martian army. Use hands free movement to launch arrows or use your elemental powers like Fire, Ice, Earth, and Lightning to take down enemies. Hold the line and defend your castle walls or risk Earth being overrun by these wacky Romans… from Mars! FEATURES • Battle endless waves of Martians determined to take over Earth • Upgrade your crossbow ballista to create the ultimate weapon of destruction • Immerse yourself in a fun & colorful cartoon world with a 360-degree virtual reality experience • Compatible with Google Cardboard
